name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minerva: Copilot for Job Search with ChatGPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accelerate your job hunt with an extension that puts it on autopilot, generating cover letters and facilitating referral requests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension provides you with a simple and efficient way to create personalized cover letters for job applications and request referrals from their professional network with ChatGPT. Auto fill job applications, generate resume, get AI powered fit score
